title: MOTOROLA Revou 164 cm (65 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Dolby Atmos and Dolby Vision  (65UHDADMRS7P)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, Remote Control, Wall Mount Stand, Pair of Desktop Stands, Quick Setup Guide, Power Cord, AV Converting Cable, 2 AAA Batteries, 4 Stand Support Screws
product_specification.Sound Technology: Dolby Atmos, DTS Studio Sound, Dolby Audio
product_specification.Other Audio Features: 360 Degree Surround Sound Feel with Dolby Atmos, 50 W High Bass Speakers, Amphisoundx Pro Soundbar, 4 Unit Setup
product_specification.Processor: MediaTek CA53 Quad Core at 1.5 GHz
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Eros Now, Sony Liv, Hungama, Zee5
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only.
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused due to Tampering of the Product by An Unauthorised Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void. We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Sound Technology: Employing Dolby Atmos with DTS Studio Sound and equipped with a 50 W AmphiSoundX Pro soundbar, this TV lets you experience surround sound while listening to music and watching your favourite shows. Also, a four-unit configuration comes with two high Bass speakers along with two high Octave tweeters that are placed at 45-degree angles to produce impactful sound.
product_description.Less Bezel, More Screen Space: Built without a driving circuit around the bezels, this TV has less bezel and more screen space on its endless edge display. So, it gives you a view like you’re looking outside a window.

review:
Writing this review, after almost a month of using it, previously I have used the realme sled tv too, so I have the idea of how TV's are in this price range, so to start with, this is a great TV, probably the best in this price bracket.

PICTURE QUALITY on this is awesome, colors are on point, default presets/modes are all perfect, DOLBY VISION makes it even better, viewing angles are awesome on this TV as it has an ADS panel, no tv in this price range offers an ADS panel, the realme sled tv had a bright VA panel therefore it had very poor viewing angles, the panel on this TV could have been brighter, but at this budget it's too much to ask for, but gets the job done even in well lit environments.

SOUND on this TV is great, its very clear, crisp and there is good amount of bass too, Dolby Atmos comes turned off out of the box, turn it on, you'll see a noticible difference in the sound output, can say its the best in this price segment.

CONNECTIVITY is great, as it has dual band WiFi, although AUX port is not there, which would have been better.

PERFORMANCE is one of the major upsides of this TV, comes with Android 10, Tv's very responsive, fast and wakes up with in 4 secs. Switching between apps is also very fast on the TV.

OVERALL this is a perfect budget TV, if you're planning to buy one, go for this without second thoughts, you'll not be disappointed, I have only rated this 4 stars, just for the above average brightness and for missing AUX port, else I would have rated it 5 stars.

Hoping this review will help you.

Hey everyone!

Purchased this product last year Oct'2020.

DON'T RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT to anyone

Initial disappointment came when Google assistant stopped working only few days after I started using the TV.
It didn't get resolved even after updating the Android OS/ security patches.

2 days before to this review, LED panel stopped showing picture.
Audio output was coming but no video was seen on the panel.

Lucky that there are 3 more months before an year completes, I have seen this issue.

After reporting it to the concerned team, Jeeves, is the partner for this services, right away told me, LED panel is busted, they are ordering for that part but highly probable that I would receive new TV instead.

And I'm not happy about that as well!
Apparently they cannot guarantee that new TV also might not work as expected on long run.

Totally disappointed with the experience of purchasing this TV.

If someone is still buying TV from Motorola, better take insurance/guarantee/warranty along with it.

Suggestions to Motorola, if at all someone concerned is reading this review, upgrade the build quality which should never be compromised I suppose.

Thanks guys for this long read.

Ciao!

Lot of hype, but read the fine print and understand what you are really buying.
1. First of all this is NOT a Motorola designed or manufactured TV. It is merely Motorola branded, Flipkart designed, Skyworth manufactured TV.
2. This means, this TV is designed and manufactured as per Flipkart standards. Not sure how it compares with Flipkart owned MarQ brand. Motorola has simply licensed its brand name. No other involvement from Motorola in product development.
3. The build quality is good, but not excellent. One can press the panel around the bezels and see it getting pushed in the housing. Does not inspire full confidence. Hope this does not cause seepage of moisture thrrough the edges.
4. The panel is of type ADS, supposed to be better than IPS. It does seem to hold similar viewing angles and contrast seems to be equivalent of a VA panel. No issues here.
5. Color reproduction is good and so is contrast. The panel is bright.
6. Sound is again adequate, but nowhere near the hype. While sound has good clarity, bass is underwhelming. An indpendant sound bar with woofer will deliver better fidelity and bass.
7. No problems with any connectivity - HDMI, HDMI ARC, USB, wi-fi with 5GHz band all tested and working seamlessly. I used HDMI ARC to connect to an external Blaupunkt soundbar and it connects seamlesslt - note you do need an HDMI cable supporting ARC. Not all HDMI cables support ARC.
8. Chromecast works without any issues.
9. Since this is Android, there is a vast library of apps available on Google play store. All apps - Prime, Netflix, Disney Hotstar, SonyLiv, etc. Work fine. One can download other apps from Google play store
10. What is surely missing is the home launcher like MI's Patchwall. The default Google Apps launcher is unimpressive and not very content friendly. I hope that the TV gets upgraded to Google TV launcher in the future. I tried side-loading the Patchwall and Google TV APKs, but they don't seem to work.

The biggest challenges are going to be around longevity of the product and service. The entire warranty and service process is managed by Jeeves, not Flipkart, not Motorola. Read the reviews of Jeeves service to learn more about the poor service. It would have been better if service were managed by Motorola to inspire confidence. Here MI beats this product hands-down, due to extensive brand-owned service centers.
I am not sure of the long term usage reviews - will be happy if this TV lasts beyond 5 years without malfunctions.

Value for money. As 4k content is not so widely available for now, don't waste too much money on branded TV's like sony, samsung,lg. Sound is too good and extra sound bar or speakers not needed. Picture quality is good enough. Even SD channels showing good results. Boots fasts. Overall a good package. (Note: 15 days review)

Video- 10 (DolbyVision works fine)
Audio- 10 (Soundbar is beautiful and loud)
Graphics- 10
Network and Conmectivity- 10
Pure Android- Wow!! Flawless! All Apps work!
Apps and Processing -10
Voice Command- 10
Delivery-10
Remote- Motorola please cut it in Half and reduce the width and length and height. It looks like 90s design.

I have been using it for last 9 days. It's a masterpiece! I had used Sony and Samsung in past. But this one is above all.
Flipkart and Jeeves are doing their best to supply and wall mount on the given time.

Cheers to all! Go grab it! No second thought!!

This tv is ome of the best in its segment..the only compitition is from Nokia with Onkyo sound...imthe picture is crisp..sound is awesome ..best stand in its class... connectivity is top knotch ..will update after i will play some games in new xbox.

Writing this review after after using 2 weeks.!
The product was superb 😊
Sound, picture quality was so good..
Connecting to wifi was good..
No buffering if u have good internet
If u having ap fiber cable...the tv will rock!!!
And
my suggestion was to "OFF" the HDMI control option.
Since,u can use built-in apps like youtube , Netflix, Amazon prime..without going back to the cable slot

Tv os is lagging too much,sound is loud but not clear we cant sometime understand voices ,main thing that bothering me is cast is not working properly from where ever you cast (YouTube ,vlc player from websites )it takes you 2008 where we used to wait for YouTube to play a small video it takes 20 min to play 5 min video .(from Google photos cast works fine).and Bluetooth gaming controller does not connect to it .and the controller works fine with my other tv and phone .

I can give 3/5 of this product, facing lots of connectivity problems.

CONNECTIVITY PROBLEM BELOW:-

1. The specific remote will not work more than 6 feet.

2. You can't watch any vedio/music via Smart view (by Samsung phone) or cast mode offline . Need to have special application to share via internet.

3. Not able to connect Phone to TV music bar except Nokia smart phone.

** rest i can say ok to buy and go for it.

Great choice for 4K Android TV.
Comes with Android 10 preloaded. Supports dual band wifi..must for FHD & 4K viewing experience.
Bluetooth 5 helps to connect Headphones for lag free Personal DND binge watching experience.
People looking for TV with Preloaded Apps just grow up & buy any Android TV with Android App Store.. you can always install all your favourite apps from App Store. So sellers talking about Preloaded apps feature is misleading.
Yes dedicated keys is a must have along with sm...

Great choice for 4K Android TV.
Comes with Android 10 preloaded. Supports dual band wifi..must for FHD & 4K viewing experience.
Bluetooth 5 helps to connect Headphones for lag free Personal DND binge watching experience.
People looking for TV with Preloaded Apps just grow up & buy any Android TV with Android App Store.. you can always install all your favourite apps from App Store. So sellers talking about Preloaded apps feature is misleading.
Yes dedicated keys is a must have along with smart voice enabled remote that comes along with the TV.
I have connected USB Camera for video calling through Google Duo... Yes available in apps Store 🥳
Lot to play around.
Just one sad news is that dongle based Gamepad is not supported you need to buy pure Bluetooth ones (Livetech) only for gaming experience.

Stylish looking TV with excellent picture quality with support of hdr10, dolby vision. Sound quality is also pretty good with dolby atmos turned on. The UI is also quite smooth & responsive most of the time.
In Netflix app though there is dolby vision logo available, but I couldn't find the dolby atmos logo there, only 5.1 surround sound is available (with pass-through audio settings). May be this tv is not registered in Netflix's dolby atmos supported device list.

Reason for 1 less star: I'm very skeptical about the manufacturing quality control. I got a defective product 1st time with bleeding issue. The panel was not sealed to the body at all, all the lights underneath were visible from the corner of the screen. I found out many users had this display bleeding problem. Moreover it also had some screen flexing issue. So had to replace the tv and the new one don't have these kind of defects.

Excellent product, nice picture quality, room for sound quality improvements but decent sound, felt the dolby effects, smooth fluid navigation, no lag, smooth connectivity

Must go for it, value for money product

Wovvv!!!!!! One of the best TVs in the market.

Picture:

I have had the doubt that this TV has brightness of 350 nitts which is not sufficient for Dolby Vision. But Motorola has done their best job in this area and the picture quality is awesome in this product. 4K videos are delivered in a very smooth manner.


Sound:

This product has 50 watts speakers. The audio output of the TV is excellent. You can really experience Dolby Atmos and DTS surround. It gives a small theatre effect in this price range. You never experience this kind of audio in any other 4K 55" TVs.

Connectivity:

Since it's supporting dual band WiFi , 4K videos are delivered in a very decent manner. Videos were never buffered.

Operating System:

Android 10 is giving fast boost, RAM optimization and new apps options.

Other features:

Auto dimming, HDR10, WOW and WOS in WiFi settings.

Note:

This product is missing MEMC. But I saw it did not affect anywhere in the picture quality and delivery of video.

So, finally I would say you can go for this product without having any second thoughts. I'm 100% sure that you'll get more satisfied than your expectations about this.

All the very best!!!!!!!!! :)

Posting this review after 7-8 months of usage. Whatever I am writing below about the product are my personal experience. I hope this may help you.
Pros: 1. This LED has a premium design with good built quality and very thin bezels.
2. The screen quality is also good with Dolby Picture Features.
3. It is based on latest android 10 version and has 2GB RAM and 32GB storage.
4. The remote also has very good built quality and the google assistant works well.
Cons: 1. The speaker could have been louder and with better quality but still its enough(average).
2. The screen mirroring doesn't works at all. You can try other ways of connecting your mobile like Google Home.
3. I have heard people complaining about screen bleeding issue.

Conclusion: You will never find all feature in a single product, therefore this LED provides a good value for money. Some other LED's in the same price range are;
1.Motorola's own ZX series
2. Nokia Onkyo 43"

Very good picture quality for all modes except when watching sports match....sports mode needs a lot of improvement ....otherthan this all picture modes are good...
Dual band wifi working good...sound quality is also good...dont believe on anyone saying that viewing angles are not good...i didnt feel that picture quality becomes dull when you move to corners of the hall...Overall its a good package ....
Only expectation is the need of motion engine when watching cricket or football match...i feel watching matches were more fun on my old tv with full hd resoulution

Excellent Product which is equivalent to all other high end TV's with superb features.
No need to think much you can purchase this TV without any doubts.
Picture quality is awesome 😍
In sound bass is somewhat less that's it remaining are excellent.
Dolby Atmos and Dolby Vision will make you theatres away from this TV.
TV remote is also very useful which comes with numeric numbers and all buttons.

I got motorolla Revou 55 inch in 39500/- before 15 days. I am fully satisfied with picture quality, working speed, sound clearity all are amazing. Just loved it. Instalation also before timing mantion . Only Miracast connection problem. Disconnect automaticaly sometimes. Little lags in while using Miracast. But no problem for me because I dont use Miracast many times. Depends on you. May be solve aftee next update.You shold use Tata sky HD pack for proper experience.I use 422 / month all mov...
READ MORE

It is amazing smart TV. Its picture and sound quality will make you feel like theatre. If you are thinking to buy budget smart TV, then definitely go for this TV. You can not get better than this in this price range. Fully satisfied with Motorola TV experience and Flipkart service.
Value for money.
It really deserve the 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟.

I have waited for 55 inch Motorola revouTV since it’s launch in Big Billion days, But to my location ,This seems not deliverable till 7th of November. So I have given preorder for 55 inches Realme TV ,but would be available from 21 st November. But as soon as Motorola revou got available I cancelled the preorder and bought this TV happily . Thanks for Flipkart for timely delivery and installation within 24hrs.
After using for 8hrs few things I would share with
It’s a great product with a luxurious feel .
Very nice picture quality .
Above average Dolby Digital sound .
Good connectivity.
Well adaptive remote for smooth functioning together with google assistant .
Nice built Quality , small Basel and back cover in metal.
After all definitely a quality product with value for money and don’t forget to take complete protection package for three years .
Certainly I would recommend to buy this product to whom ever looking for 55 inch android TV as it’s Android 10

Motorola is getting high in Indian Market... With its build and quality... Awesome product at affordable price... Got a defective one initially but got it replaced quickly... Video and Audio rocks... TV Stand is sooo cute 😂 Unique in this segment and you will love it 😍... DTS Sounds great and Dolby vision is phenomenal.... Cons - Can't expect more at this price 😜

Excellent picture and sound. I have choosen this tv after researching many TVs. There are few thing which makes this TV different from other brand TVs. First it’s ROM is 32 GB. Second metallic stand, Third it’s WiFi processor 5GHz because many tvs have 2.4 GHz which makes Internet connectivity slow, Forth Android 10 ie latest android version and fifth inbuilt sound bar. Excellent product. Go for it without thinking.

Believe me or not this TV is awesome for your home.
1. Sound system is awesome....
2. Picture clarity is good compare to other TV's in this price range..
3. You can operate TV at very fast..

U.S.B 3.0 is not accepting only I faced this issue.... U.S.B 2.0 only accepts...

I've been using this TV for about 10 days, and I am happy to own this product. Delivery and installation were great.

Display is awesome (was worried with the 350 nits and 3000:1 contrast ratio specifications, but definitely not something to fret over). Looks are fabulous. No problems with the connectivity so far.

Except, I'm disappointed with the crispiness of the sound. The music and background score are being played nicely, but not the vocals and speech. Not sure if I can fix this with a setting - but I can't properly hear what people are speaking in the frame as these voices and dialogues are not crisp enough to pierce through the background score and music. I need to really focus to understand the speech, yet will still miss a lot of things. If I increase the volume to overcome that problem - the music and background score increases even more and doesn't let the speech penetrate through their now increased volume - defeating the purpose altogether. Bottom line, I can't hear the vocals / speech properly. Either they are too low on volume, or the volume of everything else is blown out of proportions.

So a lesson learnt is that the loudness (50 watts) isn't really a measure of a good sound. Music sounds great, but not the speech. Not sure if this can be fixed at all. And if that is so, a good part of the user experience goes out the window.

*Review after 4 months of use*

Talking about the build quality it is pretty durable survived the drop test 😂 (jk). Made up of good plastic and gives a premium look with pretty small Bezels.

Currently running on Android 10 and is pretty smooth but what bothers me is whenever the tv is switched on it is a bit laggy and has sound delay but after few seconds it the lag goes away. ( Seems like a software issue which can be easily fixed )

Talking about the display and sound, it gets 10 on 10. Even though you won't get true Dolby Atmos feel for obvious reasons but still does a great job. The colours absolutely stunning and popping watching 4k content or Dolby vision content would never let you regret buying this one. But..! If you sit in the corner of the tv you can notice bright light wich goes away if you change your sitting position. This bothers me too, but yeah this can't be called light bleeding.

In a nut shell I award it 9/10.
Pretty decent product at really aggressive price, go for it.

I am writing this review after almost 15 days of installation.
Ordered and received the package in 3 days the installation process also took 2 days. The time when I recieved the TV I thought it will support all the application that we run on our phone but Android TV has it's own ecosystem. It Play Store does not have the same applications that our Play Store has. There is no file manager or Google Files and it's not available on play store also you cannot access the internal files of the TV. It has 32GB of storage and 2GB of ram, usable storage is 27GB. But I think this storage is just for show you cannot access the internal files of the TV then why do we have this storage. TV boots pretty fast. Interface is easy and it has no clutter. If you have dual band wifi the connectivity will be awesome. Picture quality is great. Brightness is also good. Colours are little dull but I think you can adjust it in the settings (I don't know how to do it). You need HD TV connection otherwise you will make the TV less charming. I haven't did any heavy task on TV but I think it will work fine. The sound quality is great. Dolby Atmos makes it awesome to listen music. I has surround sound. I keep volume on 25 usually. And it's well and audible at it. Overall it's a great TV and value for money if you are considering Android TV. Got this for 28,700 rupees on Big billion days and by using credit card got additional 12350 rupees discount. It's great deal in this price range. Picture quality is awesome, sound quality is good. And the main thing it boots very fast.

Bought for best price in Jun21 and till now not faced any issues....all are good with this TV ...Best Design for looks...picture quality is just like any other branded Tv...one should buy it with extra warranty as it is must for brands like moto n nokia as these are manufactured for Flipkart by licensing brand names...I suggest to go with it

A treat to the Eye's..this what I can tell you. Such brilliant picture quality, absolutely stunning sound, superfast processing. I love the TV, everything looks so appealing in this TV, the colors are vibrant, punchy and accurate. No problems with the connectivity, voice commands perfect, 4K runs smooth and a treat to the eyes. Just go for the TV without a Second thought over Nokia TV, as Nokia got single band wifi. A perfect buy.

This tv is the best latest technology under Rs40000/- . Every thing is quality in this tv and easy to use. I gave review after use of 5 month, over all this tv is vary nice product of motorola. Every one must by it...

I was looking tv that can operate with internet as I don't use cable tv, this is a very good tv connects to wifi with super good speed. And 50w speaker is one more big advantage. Over all picture quality and Android 10 experience performance and speed is too good.
Over all loved this tv , no complaints at all...

Excellent TV.
Software is super fast, one of the rare TV with 2GB ram and powerful processor. The difference literally shows when navigating the menus. This TV is blazing fast. Compared to my other TV which has a fire stick, this is leaps n bounds ahead.

Picture quality is excellent with contrast of a VA panel and angles that of an IPS. Best of both worlds.

Sound is bit low but is ok for a medium sized hall.

TV looks absolutely smashing, if you looking for TV for your living room, this will definitely impress your guests.

Connectivity is covered, all imp ports are there.

Build quality is excellent, all round heavy meta body, no flimsy plastic.

Overall very satisfied till now 3 months used.

Using for more than a week. Picture quality very good. Sound not as expected but ok for 24w speakers. Not supported many video formats which I have previously used in my Samsung smart tv 32" f5500.
Have to install VLC for not supported video formats.
Have to install file manager separately for exploring USB pendrive or hdd. Worth for this price. There is no option to switch to usb drive in source option. Can inmprove UI a bit user friendly for usb devices. And Again worth for this price.
Sound quality is good. Picture quality can be improved. Worth for this price in compare to other providers. Android TV and usage will be easy like Android smart phone :-)

I'm impressed with this product. I had been scouting for budget friendly Android TV for quite sometime. None of the products available in the market caught my attention. It is during the Flipkart organised sale, Motorola 55 inch TV caught my attention. It is really worth the money spent. It comes with Android 10, 32 GB internal storage, 4K resolution, 50 Watts sound output (Dolby Atmos). None of the products in this range offer this kind of thrilling sound experience. I'm also amazed at the picture quality and colour reproduction. I'm really satisfied that I'm getting the experience that big names LG, Samsung offer for higher prices. The installation has done the next day on the receiving the product. All fine and no issues till now.

The other part is I still need to know who to connect with in case on any issues later on. But I do hope, I don't have to face one.

Picture quality was very nice nd sound quality also good but we have to put more volume for dolby atmos sound option ...normal sound of tv was good nd standard or movie were good overall value for money tv

Hello everyone im writing my review after using 2 weeks..
Firstly anyone will notice once they power on this tv is that beautiful display... Its really really nice...
If you play 4k content then you clearly see whats the capability of display...
I watched some 4k Dolby vision content on Netflix and the picture quality is stunning.. But it almost took 3-4 gb per hour to show that high quality content hahahah.
Enabling Dolby Atmos for that 50 watt speaker really really makes much difference.
Coming to processor,ram and storage as everyone knows its top notch... Really very fast you can just feel power of android 10 and the processor.. never lagged
My one more advice is use this tv with a stabilizer which is almost 3k but never skip it really protects tv.
Tv looks are really premium and the build quality is also top notch...

Only con:
It doesn't have Data saver option currently but i can see its pre Installed but doesn't show in settings.. im hoping that its just a software bug and will solve it in next update...

Clearing you confusion:
Many of you have one big confusion to choose Nokia tv or Motorola renou tv..
You must be doubt about its brightness levels like it has 350 nits but nokia has 400 nits.. just tell you one thing brightness is really good never doubt about it.. even default settings are at just 50% you can increase if u feel little less. In my opinion its really bright at just 50% only..

You can just go for this premium feature packed Tv....
Amazing quality...

Hi...at last I received my mottorola tv very nice tv... sound is like a cinema hall dts mxing picture also very neat for hd channels ...sd channels are ok... installation is very fast and delivery also with covid safety measures.one thing sound s really amazing today only I installed I tell u few days latter more information.

After the initial blooper of wrong stand given to every buyer the co. replaced the whole TV from one client to another. smarter work wud have to give a free stand to everyone like OnePlus did with the TV remote. Anyways after this the TV has turned out to be simply fantastic. Superb screen superb sound and easy to navigate. The Dolby vision and hdr 10 and Dolby Atmos all make this simply leagues ahead of any TV below 70000. The sound bar with Atmos is sufficient for a normal room. 4k videos are great to watch on this bezel less TV. Just buy it if you want something that will make you happy. Only thing is after sales service and longevity but will post if anything happens .

This is my second motorola tv as i have a 55 inch motorola tv too. The first TV is so good that i chose motorola the second time too. The only confusion was between motorola ZX pro and Revou range. As i had the same looking tv like the ZX pro i chose Revou as it looks much better looking with thin bezels and streamlined shape. So lets start with my observations :
Pros:
1. The display is awesome. The colors really pop out so well and the images look so real.
2. The setup process is such a breeze. You get a notification on your mobile as soon as the setup begins and in just two three steps the setup gets going. Google has made the setup so easy that it feels like plug and play.
3. Continuing from the 2nd point, is Android 11 software on this TV. The main gripe that a lot of people had in other older motorola tv was that the tv took a lot of time to start each time one switched on the tv. That was because of android 10 software. Now with android 11 in Revou, the tv just wakes from sleep instantaneously (if you close the tv from remote and do not switch the mains off) and even when one switches on the TV from the mains switch, it still takes so less time now. I sincerely wish motorola would upgrade my older Motorola tv with Android 11 too.
4. There are two wifi bands on this TV (my older one has just 1),which helps me as i can choose the one which gives me better speeds. It helps if one is watching 4k content.
5. Everything to setup this tv comes in the box. The wall bracket also comes in the box which is such a huge relief as most tv technicians charge extra for the wall bracket. So a saving of Rs. 700 atleast. Just that the bracket looks flimsy but as the tv is thin and light, it can easily take the load.
Cons:
1. The TV has a 24watt speakers on the 43 inch model which sounds less compared to 50 watt speaker on my 55 inch other tv, which are booming speakers as compared to it. In fact the sound is hearable from 20 percent onwards on the speaker scale on this tv. And if one is watching a movie with fan on in the room, then the speaker has to be cranked to 50 percent. In the 55 inch tv, I cound never dare to go higher than 20 to 25 percent unless I want to invite the neighbors to complain for noise pollution. All said, the sound is clear on this and quality is pretty good.
2. The remote is too big for my taste. It is the same remote on all motorola tvs. Now as remote are going smaller with all tvs, motorola should consider small and sleeker remote. There are buttons on this tv that i have never used in the last two years on my older tv and will probably never use on this tv too. The number pad on this remote is just too much as it feels like the old times we had remote to change tv channels. The only plus point is that the range is very good and the tactile feel for pressing buttons is very good.

Overall its a wonderful tv to purchase and will recommend it to everyone looking to purchase a good 4k tv in this price range.

Brilliant Built by Motorola. Excellent Picture and Sound . Superbly designed. I'm reviewing this after a long satisfaction of 6 months usage.. only android tv so far with latest Android 10 and stock android. It can definitely beat all of the competitors and will have top position.
